Message: The Storage Tiers Management service started monitoring a volume on a tiered storage space. No action is required.  Volume name: {VolumeName}.

The Storage Tiers Management service reached the limit of in-memory records of reads and writes to a tiered storage space. Additional read and write activity will not be recorded or considered during optimization of storage tiers on this storage space for the rest of the hour.  Consider increasing the MaxInMemoryTreeSize registry value. Memory entries limit: {NumberEntries} Volume name: {VolumeName}
